title: Riot's biggest mistake.
body: I think we all know that by this point in time Riot has come to painfully regret the biggest mistake they have ever made.  Pretty much everyone knows the mistake I am talking about.  Yes, the creation of their most toxic champion, possibly the source of all toxicity in game.  The one and only.  Of course I am talking about Teemo.  My feedback to keep this on topic is delete Teemo.  Please and thank you Riot, I know you are a player focused company and will work endlessly to right this terrible wrong you unleashed on your loyal playerbase.

If you do manage to catch up to him and rely on autoattacks good luck because he then has a bit of time where you're blind to hit you more and run away.
